cause.description:
Please join this cause if you believe in equal rights, including the right to marry, for LGBTQ persons, and if you believe in stopping discrimination.
If each of us makes a commitment to spread awareness of discrimination, and bring an end to it, in our community, the word will spread, and our voices will be strong.
So whether you are a lesbian, gay, trans-gendered, questioning, or straight, if you believe in the cause, then join it. Make a difference. Every voice counts.
1. LGBTQ peoples have the same rights as straight people.
2. Derogatory terms are hurtful, and should be avoided.
cause.mission: To spread awareness of the discrimination that the LGBTQ community and their straight allies face.
cause.name: LGBTQ-Straight Alliance
